messages: @JonathanE22 but they must have slaves...or robots, IMO the 'new frontier' @TrueNameBrand
I wonder how many people are "activists" who buy whatever shill suits their needs with no thought
@piddlepantsmcge @phylaxis I used that word as sarcasm. I wouldn't behave. Just would be forced to wait. Such fun!
@michaelsayeth totally agree. To me sport is just mild entertainment, a reason I love real football. Nonstop action, no corporate stoppages.
@michaelsayeth ah! lol guess I'm not missing much
